briefTitle: Gynaecological Care for Transgender People in France in 2024.
officialTitle: Gynaecological Care for Transgender People in France in 2024.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of people aware of gynaecological recommendations.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* French-speaking transgender person (transgender women or transgender men)
* age ≥18 years

Exclusion Criteria:

* age \<18 years
